content: ** > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 ** **the red beanie hat** **difficulty** intermediate **materials** kartopu super chunky - soft touch bulky 100gr 80% acrylic 20% wool 98 yards 1 skein subs can be any soft acrylic or blended yarn weight #5 - 6 hook 8 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **sizes** one size 9 in height 19 in circumference **gauge** 8 st x 7 row pattern stitches **notes** this pattern is worked in rounds and row ch1 does not count as 1st st chain 3 at the beginning of the row or round does count as 1st stitch this pattern is worked bottom-up the brim is worked in row and joined to form a round stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
